vulnerable_road_users.description: A person riding a bicycle on the right side of the road, in the same direction as the vehicle is moving.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The presence of cyclists requires the vehicle to maintain a safe distance and be prepared to change the driving route if necessary, in order to avoid getting too close when overtaking.

vulnerable_road_users.description: On the road to the right under the distant bridge, a motorcycle is moving away from our vehicle's position.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The position and movement of the motorcycle are very important to itself to ensure that there is no risk of collision when the motorcycle suddenly changes direction or stops.

barriers.description: Water-filled isolation barriers have been placed at the edge of the road.
barriers.explanation: This obstacle likely indicates road construction or an obstruction; autonomous vehicles should proceed with caution and be prepared to bypass it.

other objects.description: For instance, various items including a blue bicycle leaning against the wall and benches on the sidewalk are all located on the right side close to the building.
other objects.explanation: These objects are not directly located on the road but indicate the presence of pedestrian activity and the need to enhance awareness in the surrounding area.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image observed, there are no vehicles to report, but there are vulnerable road users present. Firstly, there's a cyclist on the right side of the road going in the same direction as our vehicle. The autonomous vehicle must keep a safe distance from the cyclist and be ready to alter its course for safe overtaking. Secondly, there's a motorcycle under a distant bridge on the right, moving away from our vehicle. The autonomous system should monitor the motorcycle's trajectory to prevent any collision in case of sudden maneuvers.

Although there are no traffic signs or lights, there are water-filled barriers positioned at the edge of the road. These barriers suggest possible road work or obstructions ahead, and as such, the autonomous vehicle should be cautious and ready to navigate around them.

Lastly, the scene includes other objects like a blue bicycle leaning against a wall and benches on the sidewalk, all to the right near a building. These objects are off the road but indicate potential pedestrian activity, signaling the vehicle to stay alert to the possibility of pedestrians entering the roadway.

driving_suggestion: Due to wet and slippery road conditions, please proceed with caution and reduce speed to accommodate decreased tire traction. Maintain travel in the right lane, avoiding the restricted area on the left. Keep a safe distance from motorcycles and bicycles ahead, paying attention to their movements as this may affect your driving behavior. Be aware of the environment beyond the road surface, as the presence of bicycles and stools could indicate pedestrian activity. Be prepared to slow down or change lanes due to obstacles, and adjust your driving to ensure safety.

1.description and explanation: A tricycle with a cargo bed covered by a light-colored tarpaulin is located on the road. When approaching this tricycle, the driver of the ego car must reduce speed and prepare to steer around the tricycle, ensuring a safe distance to avoid any potential collision or safety hazard.
